backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing users, classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, and inquiries with access control and Stripe/outcall integration.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files including components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration and layout handling profile setup, reminders, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown to users who lack permissions, with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name/email fields and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/Registratio: User registration form that saves a profile via mutation, validates name, and triggers success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Restricts access to children based on user role, allowing only admins and showing a loading or denial screen otherwise.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Button to book a session that prompts login if needed and triggers booking with success/error toasts.
Checks upcoming booking times and shows toast reminders based on user settings, tracking shown reminders in sessionStorage.
Manager component that periodically scans user bookings and reminder settings, placeholder for full reminder logic.
frontend/src/components/classes/ClassEdi: Dialog form for creating a new dance class with fields, validation, and a create-class mutation.
frontend/src/components/instructor/Sessi: Static panel prompting instructors to select a session to view its roster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: App footer with branding, links, contact info, and an instructor profile block.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component with navigation links, authentication handling, and role-based menu options.
frontend/src/components/lessons/LessonEd: Dialog form for creating and uploading a new video lesson with fields for title, style, instructor, duration, and URL.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayForB: Button that creates a Stripe checkout session for a booking and redirects the user to the payment page.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Dialog form to schedule a new class session by selecting a class and entering date, time, capacity, and location details.
frontend/src/constants/classLevels.ts: Defines available class levels as a constant array and corresponding type.
frontend/src/constants/danceStyles.ts: Defines supported dance styles as a constant array and corresponding type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingDetails.ts: Fetches session and class details for a booking and returns combined loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingReminderSet: Manages localStorage‑based reminder settings per booking with state and update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile via the backend actor with loading and error management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities, and exposing login and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating dance classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, user data, and Stripe settings via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Defines mutations for creating Stripe checkout sessions and retrieving session status using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme color variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Displays and manages contact inquiries with loading, error, and sorted inquiry views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRegistrati: Shows a table of registered users with roles, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleManage: Allows admins to view their role and assign roles to users by Principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentSetupPag: Shows Stripe configuration status and provides a form to set secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, checks user profile status, and shows either loading, registration form, or completion screens.
frontend/src/pages/biodata/BiodataPage.t: Displays static biodata content including a professional summary and core competencies list.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows the authenticated user's bookings with status badges and details, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/CatalogPage.t: Displays all dance classes with search, style, and level filters plus a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/ClassDetailPa: Shows details for a specific dance class and lists upcoming sessions with booking options.
frontend/src/pages/contact/ContactPage.t: Provides a contact form that submits inquiries with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/gallery/GalleryPage.t: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/Instructor: Instructor dashboard showing class and session management with creation dialogs and class list display.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/ManageLess: Page for instructors to view, create, and manage video lessons with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonDe: Displays detailed information for a selected video lesson including embedded video and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonsP: Shows searchable and filterable grid of video lessons with navigation to lesson detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays payment cancellation message with navigation options to bookings or classes.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows payment confirmation and refreshes related queries with links to bookings or more classes.
frontend/src/pages/testimonials/Testimon: Renders testimonials with category filtering and a styled layout.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Utility for generating and downloading ICS calendar event files with proper formatting and escaping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), manage persisted values in sessionStorage, and remove parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including app goals, architectural notes, existing feature list, and versioning metadata.
